Since this is a proof of concept for discussion, can we make this change smaller by only touching 1 or 2 stores and vue files? This will make it easier to review and discuss ideas

Patch Set 6:

> Patch Set 6:
> 
> (8 comments)
> 
> Since this is a proof of concept for discussion, can we make this change smaller by only touching 1 or 2 stores and vue files? This will make it easier to review and discuss ideas

Once we all decide on a path forward with hardcoding api's we will want to talk about how we plan to implement it - all at once in a giant commit or in multiple small commits like we did in the IA/navigation update.
Removed reviewer Dixsie Wolmers <dixsiew@gmail.com>.
typo
Ack
What is p?
Ack
what is r?
Ack
I have concerns about making and managing store files, would it be possible to add this in the gobalstore.js instead of making an GlobaStore.d.js?

It is possible and we can do it, but the file will become far less readable and also very long. Here we have 50 lines and we want to the file that has 150.
Are you worried that it will no be updated when something get change?
Yes, that was my concern, it will double the number of files to be maintained in the store folders, but I understand your concern with files being too long
will this be used for all LEDs or just the inventory page?
I used this class for all LEDs (DRY principle)
Ack
why this addition?
Can we prefix the commit message with "POC:" or "WIP" for now so other reviewers know this is proof of concept/WIP and for discussion

Can you explain in more detail how the proposed changes would work and how it resolves the hardcoding issue? It will help reviewers better understand the changes since this is a really large review.

What does Truthly.js, StoreModule.js, and GetUri.js, do and how how do they work?

What are the __Mocks__ files for?
